lichen_type: primary algal photobiont, seconary cyanobiant in 2 species

notes: table 2 does have photobiont cells per mg dry wt which is interesting
this is a whole bunch of species from different studies, so size standardization might be hard
table 1 has mg chlorophyll, carbonm, and nitrogen in the dry weight; area of thallus in methods, not weight

sample_wt: 4-8 thalli (0.6-1.1 g dry wt) in one cuvette

units: nmol O2 * g dry wt^-1 * min^-1
nmol O2 * g dry wt^-1 * min^-1
